Package com.snap2d.gl

Interface Summary
Renderable Defines a standard for objects that are rendered on screen and called on each tick of the game loop.
 

Class Summary
Display Represents the underlying frame used to display rendered content on screen.
GammaTable Pre-calculates an internal table of gamma corrected RGB values and provides look-up functionality to apply the gamma to integer pixels.
GLConfig Object that represents configuration data for Java2D rendering.
RenderControl Acts as a rendering handle to a Display.
RenderControl.RenderThreadFactory  
 

Enum Summary
Display.Type  
GLConfig.Property Properties used by Java2D (configurable at start or by System.setProperty).
